contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 24, 1955 D Oxford Annual Contest (Section C)
Oxford Annual Contest (Section C) 130 Test Piece Contest Oxford Annual Contest oxford-21st-annual-section-c
The Joy of Youth
Oxford Town Hall, Oxford, Oxfordshire, England, UK Eighth Annual Contest organised By City of Oxford Silver Band.
Cornet medal: Stroud District Euphonium medal: Dannemora Steel Works
Three separate original programmes have three substantially different versions of the draw. The one given here (from a programme owned by the contest organiser) is the only one of the three not to contain obvious inconsistencies.
June 23, 2012, 11:17 a.m. Jan. 27, 2013, 8:34 p.m.
